Grouped_Utterances: Hi! I’ve been good. I’ve been practicing the breathing exercises before bed. Not really. Work has been steady, and I’m managing my time better. I’ve been thinking about my goals and what I want to achieve this year. I want to finish my degree, improve my football skills, and be a better parent.
Yes, I’ve been waking up at 6:00 AM most days.

I’ve been more focused at work and school, which is nice. They feel less chaotic, and I actually enjoy having that quiet time. I found a local league! I’m really excited to start. I feel really good about it. I think it’ll help me connect with others and have fun.
I try to be calm and encourage him to take breaks when he gets too frustrated. I’ve been journaling a bit, just to get my thoughts out. It helps me clear my mind and reflect on my day.
For school, I can set aside specific study times. For football, I can practice a couple of times a week. And for parenting, I can plan more activities with my son.
